content: SYDNEY  Nov 10 The Australian hotel operator owned by billionaire Harry Triguboff deliberately withheld unhappy customers' details from travel review site TripAdvisor to avoid bad reviews  a court found on Friday.

content: TripAdvisor Inc's  quarterly revenue fell 3 percent  missing analyst estimates  as a rise in hotel bookings on its websites hurt revenue from referrals to third-party sites.TripAdvisor has been allowing users in the United States and the UK to reserve hotels directly on its websites since 2014  charging hotels a fee for the bookings. The feature was rolled out globally in the first quarter.
name: TripAdvisor Inc
title: TripAdvisor revenue falls as referral revenue drops

content: July 29 Selling itself could be one of the few options left for Yelp Inc  which is struggling to win advertising dollars in an increasingly crowded market that already includes Google Inc  TripAdvisor Inc  and GrubHub Inc.

title: Yelp needs help  and buyout may be the answer

content: MILAN  July 14 An Italian court has cancelled a fine against online travel company TripAdvisor for allegedly publishing misleading information in its reviews  overturning an order by the country's competition authority.
name: TripAdvisor Inc
title: TripAdvisor wins appeal against Italian fine for misleading reviews
